name: Patient Zero (ShaganovDev)
description:
WARNING!

This is the alpha version. There is 1 zone available here - the lobby. You can feel the weapons, as well as throw a grenade. Evaluate the style. The next version will be with enemies that can be killed.

=============================================================

STORY

An engineer arrives at an old Soviet space station for repairs. But after docking he finds that no one is there. But then he encounters the virus-infected workers of the station. The player has to survive on the space station and figure out the reasons for the infection. Everything becomes more complicated when the crazy AI begins to interfere with the player's understanding of the station's problems.

=============================================================

CONTROLS

  • Oculus Quest
  • Valve Index
  • WMR
